item.title: Kering 第三季度销售额超预期，投资者押注 Gucci 东家东山再起
item.description: 法国开云集团（Kering）周三表示，其旗舰品牌古驰（Gucci）第三季度的销售额下降了14%，集团整体销售额同比下降了5%，超出市场预期。【原文：Sales at Kering's flagship brand Gucci fell by 14% in the third quarter with overall group sales down 5% on a like-for-like basis, the French group said on Wednesday, beating market expectations.】

item.title: 北美市场不如预期，米其林销售额受挫
item.description: 法国轮胎制造商米其林报告今年第三季度销售额下降 6.6%，低于市场预期，原因是北美市场的经营状况不如预期【原文：French tyre maker Michelin reported a 6.6% decline in sales in the third quarter of the year, below market expectations, citing worse-than-expected business conditions in the North American market】

item.title: 惠誉称美国支持帮助阿根廷避免评级下调
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周三表示，美国对阿根廷市场的支持阻止了对这个南美国家信用评级的下调，但该国需要一个更广泛的计划来重建外汇储备，以获得评级上调。【原文：U.S. support for Argentina's markets has prevented a downgrade of the South American country's credit rating, but the country needs a broader plan to rebuild foreign exchange reserves in order to earn an upgrade, Fitch Ratings said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，阿波罗正在探索出售西班牙裔食品零售商 Heritage Grocers Group
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）正寻求出售旗下的西班牙裔杂货连锁店 Heritage Grocers Group，售价约为 15 亿美元，因为担心移民突袭会削弱全美拉丁裔社区的消费需求。【原文：Private equity firm Apollo Global Management is looking to sell its Hispanic grocery chain Heritage Grocers Group, which could fetch roughly $1.5 billion, as fear of immigration raids weakens consumer demand in Latino communities across the U.S., according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: T.罗尔-普莱斯公司申请主动管理型加密货币 ETF
item.description: 资产管理公司 T. Rowe Price 周三申请设立一只主动管理型加密货币交易所交易基金。【原文：Asset manager T. Rowe Price filed for an actively managed crypto exchange-traded fund on Wednesday.】

item.title: 油价持续低迷，第三季度上游油气交易减少
item.description: 分析公司 Enverus 周三表示，持续疲软的原油价格给第三季度美国上游石油和天然气行业的并购活动带来了压力。【原文：Persistently weak crude prices pressured merger and acquisition activity in the U.S. upstream oil and gas sector in the third quarter, analytics firm Enverus said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 2025 年美国家庭医疗保险费将增至 27,000 美元
item.description: 据健康政策组织 KFF 的一项调查显示，2025 年美国拥有雇主资助医疗保险的家庭的年保费上涨了 6%，达到近 2.7 万美元，这反映出流行的减肥治疗和其他处方药的支出增加。【原文：Annual premiums for U.S. families with employer-sponsored health insurance in 2025 rose 6% to nearly $27,000, reflecting higher spending on popular weight-loss treatments and other prescription drugs, according to a survey by health-policy organization KFF.】

item.title: 谷歌称已开发出具有里程碑意义的量子计算算法
item.description: 谷歌表示，它已开发出一种计算机算法，为量子计算的实际应用指明了方向，并将能够生成独特的数据供人工智能使用。【原文：Google said it has developed a computer algorithm that points the way to practical applications for quantum computing and will be able to generate unique data for use with artificial intelligence.】

item.title: First Brands 破产引发美国贷款资金大幅外流
item.description: 由于 First Brands 集团的破产引发了人们对私人信贷市场不透明融资和承销标准是否健全的担忧，美国贷款基金本月资金急剧外流。【原文：U.S. loan funds are seeing sharp outflows this month as the bankruptcy of First Brands Group raises concerns over opaque financing and the robustness of underwriting standards in the private credit market.】

item.title: 次级贷款机构 PrimaLend Capital Partners 申请破产保护
item.description: 次级贷款机构 PrimaLend Capital Partners 于周三申请破产保护，这再次表明美国低收入消费者正面临压力。【原文：Subprime lender PrimaLend Capital Partners filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection on Wednesday, in another sign that low-income consumers in the United States are under strain.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）和 Equinor 在巴西盐下层开采前的拍卖中获得大部分区块
item.description: 巴西石油监管机构ANP周三公布，巴西国有石油公司巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）和挪威Equinor公司成为巴西盐下层地区区块拍卖的大赢家，各获得一个区块，并合作勘探第三个区块。【原文：Brazil's state-run oil firm Petrobras and Norway's Equinor were the big winners in an auction for blocks in Brazil's pre-salt area, acquiring one block each and partnering up to explore a third one, the country's oil regulator ANP made public on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国法院文件显示，桑坦德银行对 First Brands 有 5500 万美元的债务风险敞口
item.description: 路透社看到的一份美国法庭文件显示，截至 9 月底，西班牙桑坦德银行对破产汽车零部件制造商 First Brands 集团的债务风险敞口至少达 5500 万美元。【原文：Spanish bank Santander had debt exposure to bankrupt auto parts maker First Brands Group of at least $55 million by the end of September, a U.S. court document, seen by Reuters, showed.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，联合信贷银行首席执行官因并购清晰度问题再次面临董事会压力
item.description: 四位知情人士称，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）首席执行官安德里亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）正面临着该银行董事会的持续要求，即提供有关其并购战略的详细、及时的最新信息。【原文：UniCredit CEO Andrea Orcel is facing persistent requests from the Italian bank's board to provide detailed and timely updates about his merger and acquisition strategy, four people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 英国数据中心支出将飙升至每年 100 亿英镑 - Barbour ABI
item.description: 建筑数据公司 Barbour ABI 的分析发现，到 2029 年，英国新建数据中心的支出将增至每年 100 亿英镑，比 2024 年增长五倍多。【原文：Spending on new UK data centres is set to rise to 10 billion pounds a year by 2029, a more than five-fold increase from 2024, analysis by construction data firm Barbour ABI has found.】

item.title: Metagenomi 利用亚马逊的定制芯片开发基因编辑工具
item.description: 生物技术公司Metagenomi表示，它正在使用亚马逊公司云计算部门的人工智能芯片，为其开发基因编辑技术的部分工作提供动力。【原文：Biotech firm Metagenomi said it is using artificial intelligence chips from Amazon.com's cloud computing unit to power some of its work in developing gene-editing technologies.】

item.title: 英国监管机构起诉加密货币交易所 HTX 非法促销
item.description: 英国市场监管机构已对中国企业家孙正义（Justin Sun）顾问的全球加密货币交易所 HTX 提起诉讼，指控其非法向英国消费者推广加密货币资产服务。【原文：Britain's markets regulator has filed a lawsuit against HTX, a global crypto exchange advised by Chinese entrepreneur Justin Sun, accusing it of unlawfully promoting crypto asset services to UK consumers.】

item.title: 联合国负责人表示，基于规则的贸易体系面临脱轨风险
item.description: 联合国负责人周三表示，全球贸易体系正面临关税带来的重大挑战，发展中国家受到的影响最为严重。【原文：The head of the United Nations said on Wednesday that the global trade system was facing major challenges due to tariffs, with developing countries worst affected.】

item.title: 从 FOMO 到对追加保证金的恐惧：黄金的狂飙进入新阶段
item.description: 随着投机者的影响不断扩大，黄金的大幅上涨进入了一个新阶段，带来了更大的波动性，但即使央行需求放缓，市场参与者仍坚持对2026年黄金价格走高的预测。【原文：Gold's remarkable rise has moved into a new phase with the swelling influence of speculators bringing greater volatility yet market players are sticking with forecasts for higher prices in 2026 even if central bank demand eases.】

item.title: 受中国主导的供应过剩和关税影响，美国化工企业本季度业绩将再度疲软
item.description: 由于关税、工业需求疲软和中国产能过剩挤压了整个行业的利润率和情绪，美国化工企业很可能又将公布一个盈利低迷的季度。【原文：U.S. chemical companies are likely to post another quarter of subdued earnings as tariffs, weak industrial demand and Chinese overcapacity squeeze margins and sentiment across the sector.】

item.title: 英国加强对苹果和谷歌在移动领域的监督
item.description: 英国周三采取行动放松苹果和谷歌对智能手机市场的控制，将这两家公司指定为 "战略市场地位"，赋予英国要求科技巨头做出具体改变以促进竞争的权力。【原文：Britain on Wednesday moved to loosen the grip of Apple and Google in smartphones by designating them as having "strategic market status", giving it the powers to demand the tech giants make specific changes to boost competition.】

item.title: 澳大利亚要求人工智能聊天机器人公司详细说明儿童保护措施
item.description: 澳大利亚已命令四家人工智能聊天机器人公司解释其保护儿童免受性或自我伤害材料影响的措施，因为澳大利亚互联网监管机构正在加强人工智能领域的安全措施。【原文：Australia has ordered four artificial-intelligence chatbot companies to explain their measures to protect children from exposure to sexual or self-harm material, as its internet regulator beefs up safety measures on the AI fronti】

item.title: 穆迪称美国银行向私人债权人提供的贷款激增可能带来风险
item.description: 穆迪（Moody's）周二在一份报告中称，美国银行对私人信贷提供商的贷款已激增至近 3,000 亿美元，该评级机构警告称，如果承保标准减弱，小型贷款机构可能会面临更大的风险。【原文：U.S. banks' loans to private credit providers have surged to nearly $300 billion, Moody's said in a report on Tuesday, and the ratings agency warned that smaller lenders could face heightened risks if underwriting standards weaken.】

item.title: 安费诺预计本季度业绩强劲，人工智能和数据通信需求提升销售额
item.description: 受电缆、传感器和天线等产品需求旺盛的推动，安费诺公司周三预计第四季度业绩将高于华尔街预期，股价盘前上涨 9%。【原文：Amphenol forecast fourth-quarter results above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, driven by a strong demand for its products such as cables, sensors and antennas, sending its shares up 9% before the bell.】

item.title: 应用数字公司与 hyperscaler 签订价值 50 亿美元的人工智能基础设施租约
item.description: 应用数字公司（Applied Digital）周三与美国一家超级分销商签订了一份价值 50 亿美元的租约，在其位于北达科他州的北极星锻造 2 号园区租用 200 兆瓦，这使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 4%。【原文：Applied Digital on Wednesday signed a $5 billion lease with a U.S.-based hyperscaler for 200 MW at its Polaris Forge 2 campus in North Dakota, sending its shares up 4% in premarket trading.】

item.title: Beyond Meat 股价飙升，零售商兴趣激增引发 "主题股 "热潮
item.description: Beyond Meat 的股价在周三的盘前交易中跳涨了约 130%，这主要是受到散户交易员新一波买盘的推动，他们近年来曾在华尔街掀起了一股模仿股狂潮。【原文：Beyond Meat's highly shorted shares jumped about 130% in premarket trading on Wednesday, fueled by a fresh wave of buying among retail traders who have sparked meme stock frenzies on Wall Street in recent years.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国联邦储备委员会提出计划，大幅降低大银行的资本上调幅度
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，美联储已向其他美国监管机构展示了一份修订计划的大纲，该计划将大幅放宽拜登时代针对华尔街最大贷款机构提出的银行资本建议。【原文：The Federal Reserve has shown other U.S. regulators the outlines of a revised plan that would dramatically relax a Biden-era bank capital proposal for Wall Street's largest lenders, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲奢侈品集团对冲押注，预测中国市场将卷土重来
item.description: 从路威酩轩集团（LVMH）到爱马仕（Hermes）和欧莱雅（L'Oreal）等欧洲奢侈品公司都在试探性地指出中国市场的复苏迹象，但同时也对其最大市场之一在经历两年低迷后的转机持谨慎态度。【原文：Europe's luxury companies from LVMH to Hermes and L'Oreal are tentatively pointing to signs of a revival in China, but are also cautious about calling the turn on one of their biggest markets after a two-year slump.】

item.title: 加密货币交易公司 FalconX 将购买 21 只股票，推动 ETF 发展
item.description: FalconX 周三表示，它将收购加密货币投资管理公司 21shares，这家数字资产交易公司希望扩大其交易所交易基金产品。【原文：FalconX said on Wednesday it will buy crypto investment management firm 21shares, as the digital assets trading firm looks to expand its exchange-traded funds offerings.】

item.title: 据 Axios 报道，Meta 将削减人工智能部门约 600 个职位
item.description: 据 Axios 周三报道，Meta 将从其超级智能实验室（Superintelligence Labs）人工智能部门的数千个职位中裁减约 600 个职位。【原文：Meta is cutting roughly 600 positions out of the several thousand roles within its Superintelligence Labs artificial intelligence unit, Axios reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 金银创纪录大涨后，黄金矿商将迎来丰厚利润
item.description: 在金银价格创纪录反弹的推动下，黄金矿商有望在第三季度实现出色的盈利，投资者正在关注顶级生产商纽蒙特和巴里克最近首席执行官变动的最新情况。【原文：Gold miners are on track to deliver stellar third-quarter earnings, fueled by a record rally in bullion prices, with investors watching for updates on the recent CEO changes at top producers Newmont and Barrick .】
